caption.p: Quantification of extracellular hydrogen peroxide levels after inhibitor treatment (50 μM applied concentrations) using the Amplex Red reagent in HIEC-6 (A) and PHH (B). The data show the mean H 2O 2 concentrations (µM)±SDs. The treatment did not cause significant differences of the extracellular H 2O 2 production between the control and the treated groups in HIEC-6 ( p>.05, n = 8). On PHH, the treatment elevated the extracellular H 2O 2 production, in comparison to the control group ( p<.05, n = 8).
